instruction: Given a sentence, explain why you think it is true.
input: Good communication is essential in a successful relationship.
output: Good communication is essential in a successful relationship because it allows individuals to express their feelings and opinions to one another, as well as staying connected to each other in an honest and respectful way. Clear and open communication allows both people to be aware of each other’s feelings, thoughts and concerns, so that any issues or disagreements can be addressed and handled in a timely manner. It is important in any relationship that both parties are comfortable talking and listening to one another, as well as understanding how one word or action can affect the other. Good communication is vital for any relationship to remain healthy and happy.
